verses.verse: Gather yourselves together, <WH7197> yes, <WH7197> gather together, you nation <WH1471> that has no shame, <WH3700>

before the appointed <WH2706> time <WH3205> when the day <WH3117> passes <WH5674> as the chaff, <WH4671> before <WH3808> the fierce <WH2740> anger <WH639> of Yahweh <WH3068> comes <WH935> on you, <WH3117> before the day of Yahweh <WH3068>'s anger <WH639> comes on you. <WH935>

Seek <WH1245> Yahweh, <WH3068> all you humble <WH6035> of the land, <WH776> who have kept <WH6466> his ordinances. <WH4941> Seek <WH1245> righteousness. <WH6664> Seek <WH1245> humility. <WH6038> It may be <WH194> that you will be hidden <WH5641> in the day <WH3117> of Yahweh <WH3068>'s anger. <WH639>

For Gaza <WH5804> will be forsaken, <WH5800> and Ashkelon <WH831> a desolation. <WH8077> They will drive out <WH1644> Ashdod <WH795> at noonday, <WH6672> and Ekron <WH6138> will be rooted up. <WH6131>

Woe <WH1945> to the inhabitants <WH3427> of the sea <WH3220> coast, <WH2256> the nation <WH1471> of the Cherethites! <WH3774> The word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> is against you, <WH3667> Canaan, the land <WH776> of the Philistines. <WH6430> I will destroy <WH6> you, <WH3427> that there will be no inhabitant.
The sea <WH3220> coast <WH2256> will be pastures, <WH5116> with cottages <WH3741> for shepherds <WH7462> and folds <WH1448> for flocks. <WH6629>

The coast <WH2256> will be for the remnant <WH7611> of the house <WH1004> of Judah. <WH3063> They will find pasture. <WH7462> In the houses <WH1004> of Ashkelon, <WH831> they will lie down <WH7257> in the evening, <WH6153> for Yahweh, <WH3068> their God, <WH430> will visit <WH6485> them, <WH7725> and restore them. <WH7622>

I have heard <WH8085> the reproach <WH2781> of Moab, <WH4124> and the insults <WH2781> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon, <WH5983> with which they have reproached <WH2778> my people, <WH5971> and magnified <WH1431> themselves against their border. <WH1366>

Therefore as I live, <WH2416> says <WH5002> Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies, <WH6635> the God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> surely Moab <WH4124> will be as Sodom, <WH5467> and the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> as Gomorrah, <WH6017> a possession <WH4476> of nettles, <WH2738> and salt pits, <WH4379> and a perpetual <WH5704> desolation. <WH8077> The remnant <WH7611> of my people <WH5971> will plunder <WH962> them, <WH3499> and the survivors of my nation <WH1471> will inherit them. <WH5157>
This they will have for their pride, <WH1347> because they have reproached <WH2778> and magnified <WH1431> themselves against the people <WH5971> of Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies. <WH6635>

Yahweh <WH3068> will be awesome <WH3372> to them, <WH7329> for he will famish all the gods <WH430> of the land. <WH776> Men will worship <WH7812> him, <WH376> everyone from his place, <WH4725> even all the shores <WH339> of the nations. <WH1471>
You <WH1992> Cushites also, <WH1992> you will be killed <WH2491> by my sword. <WH2719>

He will stretch out <WH5186> his hand <WH3027> against the north, <WH6828> destroy <WH6> Assyria, <WH804> and will make <WH7760> Nineveh <WH5210> a desolation, <WH8077> as dry <WH6723> as the wilderness. <WH4057>

Herds <WH5739> will lie down <WH7257> in the midst <WH8432> of her, <WH2416> all the animals of the nations. <WH1471> Both the pelican <WH6893> and the porcupine <WH7090> will lodge <WH3885> in its capitals. <WH3730> Their calls <WH6963> will echo <WH7891> through the windows. <WH2474> Desolation <WH2721> will be in the thresholds, <WH5592> for he has laid bare <WH6168> the cedar beams. <WH731>

This is the joyous <WH5947> city <WH5892> that lived <WH3427> carelessly, <WH983> that said <WH559> in her heart, <WH3824> "I am, <WH657> and there is none besides me. <WH8047>" How she has become a desolation, a place for animals <WH2416> to lie down in! <WH4769> Everyone who passes by <WH5674> her will hiss, <WH8319> and shake <WH5128> their fists. <WH3027>
